column5: Talk about hilarious inventions, check out the link: http://www.coveryourbass.com/

yeah real hilarious  lets think at bit shall we!!!  $109 for basic unit cost maybe $45 to $50 if that  lets say he sells a million to distributers for $80 that is $30 profit per unit times 1 million = 30 milliopn bucks  and for sure over a million americns will buy it that is what is hilarious, for him all the way to the bank
and besides I would probably poop myself before I go twit set up anyhow LOL!!!!!

Well, all I can say is that it's a product that's needed when the urge strikes.  It looks a little large, how about something the size of one of those ice fishing chairs where the cover pulls overtop.
Just make sure your not down wind.

LOL... yah I can see chasing that down the lake in the wind!!!  What's wrong with this and holding a blanket up for the ladies..    I have a nice low profile one in my boat that slips right under the bow insert where you walk thru the windshield.
That's the most ridiculous thing I ever seen. I would love to see that on a typical windy day. I would be surprised if a couple thousand were ever sold here or in Canada.
Ain't that what the yellow buckit's fer? We larned that at the Taronna Show.  JF
Yea tell me about it ehh
hahah yea, I guess this a more private way to fill them ! haha
Suicide by gas inhalation, or do ya smoke?  JF
